guidelines:
- Use with Ultra Streptavidin Detection Kit (SIG-32250) or (SIG-32248)

 

- Positive control: Normal human skin

{"blocks":[{"key":"t8kd","text":"A. 70% Formic Acid - incubate the slides for 20 minutes at room temperature. Note:This antigen retrieval step is harsh on the tissue. If using frozen sections reduce time to 5-10 minutes or omit if tissue falls off the slide.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"style":"bold"},{"offset":77,"length":5,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2manr","text":"B.
